result.title: Dissemination plan, develop of a communication & dissemination plan with the main tasks - 4
result.description: This deliverable will include the third revision of the Dissemination and Communication Plan of the project: project’s audiences, key messages, roles, responsibilities and communication channels for the dissemination, promoting the diffusion at all levels. result.title: Report on generated knowledge in BIORECOVER to feed the RMIS - 2
result.description: This deliverable will include the final relevant knowledge acquired of the project from the BIORECOVER raw materials to feed the RMIS. They will be included: - Report on impact of BIORECOVER on raw materials policy: A document compiling the indicators of Raw Materials Scoreboard with qualitative and quantitative data.- Report on market assessment related to BIORECOVER: A document collecting the trade-related information of REE, Mg and PGM (data on import/exports, trade restrictions and barriers). Also economic aspects will be included.- Report on material efficiency and value chain of BIORECOVER raw materials, with the information about the quantity and quality of the secondary resources of BIORECOVER, as well as an evaluation or recovered raw materials value chain.- Report on Social & Environmental Assessment of the BIORECOVER, gathering the relevant information related to social and environmental issues.

result.title: Technological and non-technological risks 3
result.description: In this deliverable, the results of the risk assessment of BIORECOVER process will be presented. The potential risks will be identified and quantified. A list of risk triggers will be supplied together with risk plans to minimise/avoid them; Final Results.

result.title: Replicability through a circular economy model
result.description: This deliverable will contain the design of a circular economy model for the extraction, use and reuse of CRM: analysis of different types of stakeholders, characterization of stakeholders’ role, their motivation for change and drivers & barriers, conditions and key success factors required to develop and replicate such circular models with other raw materials and from other industries, main steps to implement a circular economy model and guidelines to potential replicable cases.

result.title: Report on generated knowledge in BIORECOVER to feed the RMIS - 1
result.description: This deliverable will include the primary relevant knowledge acquired of the project from the BIORECOVER raw materials to feed the RMIS They will be included Report on impact of BIORECOVER on raw materials policy A document compiling the indicators of Raw Materials Scoreboard with qualitative and quantitative data Report on market assessment related to BIORECOVER A document collecting the traderelated information of REE Mg and PGM data on importexports trade restrictions and barriers Also economic aspects will be included Report on material efficiency and value chain of BIORECOVER raw materials with the information about the quantity and quality of the secondary resources of BIORECOVER as well as an evaluation or recovered raw materials value chain Report on Social Environmental Assessment of the BIORECOVER gathering the relevant information related to social and environmental issues

result.description: This deliverable will comprise the first results of the LCA to evaluate and quantify socioeconomic impacts of BIORECOVER technology on the organisations and their employees involved throughout the project life cycle and the comparison with the impacts of current techniques for obtaining CRMs The quantification and interpretation of the Socioeconomic key performance indicators KPI will be also included Finally the results of the public perception study and the consumer survey in 3 countries will be analysed along this deliverable

result.title: Technological and non-technological risks 1
result.description: In this deliverable, the results of the risk assessment of BIORECOVER process will be presented. The potential risks will be identified and quantified. A list of risk triggers will be supplied together with risk plans to minimise/avoid them; Initial Results.
